api_list.name: TRACKING & RECOVERING STOLEN CRYPTO \\ HACKATHON TECH SOLUTIONS
api_list.description: I found Hackathon Tech Solution with the help of our new intern who referred me to give hackers a try, I’m really glad I listened. With the support of Hackathon Tech Solutions and my Assets recovered I was able to return to investing but only in Stocks now, I stayed away from cryptocurrencies after the scam experience. We often can’t avoid the negative patterns financially but if it’s a wrong investment at the hands of scammers Hackathon Tech Solution has you covered. Don’t hesitate to reach out to info@ hackathon tech solution . com, if you fall victim to this online  Bitcoin or cryptocurrency scam. Their website is https://hackathontechsolutions.com & WhatsApp is  +31647999256
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://recovery-and-tracking.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "recovery-and-tracking.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
